text: Hyderabad Metropolitan Region is the metropolitan area covered by the city of Hyderabad in the Indian state of Telangana. The entire region is spread over the districts of Hyderabad District, Medchal-Malkajgiri, Ranga Reddy, Sangareddy, Medak, Siddipet and Yadadri Bhuvanagiri. Under the jurisdiction of Hyderabad Metropolitan Development Authority, it covers an area of and has a population of 9.75 million people. 272px == Jurisdiction == {| class="wikitable" |- ! S.No !!
